tutorial.text1: Browse through your favorite shops or restaurants, search for the food you crave, and add it to your cart.
tutorial.text2: Once you've selected your food, head to the checkout page and pay for your order using your preferred payment method.
tutorial.text3: After payment confirmation, sit back and relax! You'll receive updates on the status of your order, so you can track your food's journey to your home.

find-page.title: Order Your Favorite Food from Our List of Restaurants
find-page.desc: Discover a wide variety of restaurants and cuisines at your fingertips. Browse through our list of popular eateries and order your favorite dishes for delivery or pickup. From classic comfort food to international flavors, we have it all. Browse our list of restaurants below and start ordering today!

product-page.title: Discover the Best Dishes from Our Partner Restaurants
product-page.desc: Explore the menus of our partner restaurants and discover a world of flavors. From classic comfort food to international cuisine, we have it all. Browse through our list of dishes and order your favorite meals for delivery.

favorite-page.title: Your Favorite Shops
favorite-page.empty: You have not selected any shops yet!

order-page.title: Your Recent Orders
order-page.empty: You have not placed any order yet!

labels.address-placeholder: Where should we deliver your order?

error.label: You order already has some products from a different shop

auth-page.desc: Please enter your credentials to continue
